projects.name: AI driven 2D perovskite discovery
projects.description: Professor Tom Wu's Group, University of New South Wales
highlights: Developed an AI-assisted materials discovery pipeline for the design of 2D hybrid perovskites.
Inverse-designed novel 2D perovskite candidates targeting specific electronic properties.

projects.name: Multi-scale modelling of 2D materials
projects.description: Professor Jianhua Hao's Group, The Hong Kong Polytechnic University
highlights: Investigated synthesis and luminescence in 2D materials using first-principles modeling.
Studied the mechanisms of large-scale black phosphorus growth via molecular dynamics simulations.
